Cougaar 12.7

Uses of Interface
org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceProvider

Packages that use ServiceProvider
org.cougaar.core.adaptivity This package contains the Cougaar adaptivity engine and client APIs. 
org.cougaar.core.agent.service.containment   
org.cougaar.core.blackboard This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService. 
org.cougaar.core.component   
org.cougaar.core.logging   
org.cougaar.core.mts.singlenode This package contains a single-node MTS implementation, created for performance characterization and MTS overhead computation. 
org.cougaar.core.node This package contains the Cougaar JVM node and node-level services. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.ca Coordination Artifacts are designed to separate out an abstract communication pattern, on the one hand, and the domain-specific clients of the communication on the other. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.frame Overview: The Cougaar Frame infrastructure provides a lightweight and efficiently distributed form of knowledge representation supporting two independent inheritance hierarchies, path following, and code generation. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip The Gossip subsystem allows Metrics collected on one Node to be disseminated to other Nodes in the society. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.metrics This package contains the Cougaar "Quality of Service" (QoS) support for runtime metrics. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.rss This package defines an implemenation of the metrics services that uses the ResourceStatusService (RSS) as its underlying infrastructure. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.tmatrix   
org.cougaar.core.thread This package contains the Cougaar pooled ThreadService implementation. 
org.cougaar.core.wp.resolver   
org.cougaar.mts.base This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.corba This package contains the software components needed for the CORBA Link Protocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.http This package contains the software components needed for the HTTP and HTTPS Link Protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.jms   
org.cougaar.mts.rmi This package contains the RMI and RMI-SSL link protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.std This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime. 
org.cougaar.mts.stream   
org.cougaar.mts.udp   
org.cougaar.mts.xmpp   
org.cougaar.planning.ldm

Classes in org.cougaar.mts.base that implement ServiceProvider
 class AspectSupportImpl
          This ServiceProvider provides the AspectSupport service, which is implemented by an inner class.
 class DestinationQueueFactory
          This Component implements the DestinationQueueProviderService, which makes DestinationQueues on demand, and the DestinationQueueMonitorService, which allows clients to be notified of queue events.
 class LinkProtocol
          The parent class of all Link Protocols.
 class LinkSelectionPolicyServiceProvider
          This ServiceProvider provides the LinkSelectionPolicy service.
 class LoopbackLinkProtocol
          This protocol Component handles intra-node message traffic.
 class MessageDelivererFactory
          This ServiceProvider provides the MessageDeliverer service, which is implemented by a singleton MessageDelivererImpl.
 class MessageProtectionServiceImpl
          This ServiceProvider both provides and implements the MessageProtectionService.
 class MessageTransportRegistry
          The MessageTransportRegistry ServiceProvider singleton is a utility instance that helps certain pieces of the message transport subsystem to find one another.
 class MessageTransportServiceProvider
          This Component and Container is the ServiceProvider for the MessageTransportService.
 class NameSupportImpl
          This ServiceProvider provides the NameSupport service.
 class ReceiveLinkFactory
          This ServiceProvider both provides and implements the ReceiveLinkProviderService.
 class RouterFactory
          This ServiceProvider provides the Router service.
 class RPCLinkProtocol
          This is the parent class of all LinkProtocols that use a remote-procedure-call (rpc) semantics.
 class SendQueueFactory
          This ServiceProvider provides and implements the SendQueueProviderService.

Classes in org.cougaar.mts.http that implement ServiceProvider

          This LinkProtocol uses the Cougaar's ServletService (Tomcat) for communication via http.

          This LinkProtocol uses the Cougaar's ServletService (Tomcat) for communication via https (ssl).

          This class implements a Cougaar LinkProtocol that uses JMS as the transport.
 

Uses of ServiceProvider in org.cougaar.mts.rmi
 

Classes in org.cougaar.mts.rmi that implement ServiceProvider
 class RMILinkProtocol
          This LinkProtocol handles message passing via RMI, one example of RPC communication.
 class SerializedRMILinkProtocol
          This LinkProtocol is a simple extension of RMILinkProtocol that uses preserialization to send byte-arrays via the SerializedMT interface rather than AttributedMessages via the MT interface.
 class SSLRMILinkProtocol
          This LinkProtocol supports rmi over ssl.
